ability_text: I can write simple programs in languages like Python or JavaScript.
I can create and style websites using HTML and CSS.
I know how to promote products or services using social media platforms like Instagram and Facebook.
I can use software like Photoshop to edit and improve photos.
I can use tools like Excel to analyze data and create charts.
I can write interesting blog posts on different topics.
I can speak and understand more than one language.
I can take good photos using a camera or smartphone.
I can come up with and develop new business ideas.
I can make and edit videos using software like iMovie or Premiere Pro.
I know how to keep computers and personal information safe from hackers.
I am comfortable speaking in front of groups of people.
I work well with others to achieve common goals.
I can organize my time effectively to complete tasks.
I know how to help and communicate with customers to solve their problems.
I can plan and organize events like parties or meetings.
I can find solutions to problems quickly and effectively.
I can write stories, poems, or other creative pieces.
I know how to find and gather information on different topics.
I can cook simple meals and follow recipes.
